attributes.action: Minimum 5 years for assaulting a Police Officer
attributes.additional_details: Just look at the recent news... the police is a laughing stock. People have no respect for the law, if they don’t get punished appropriately  for their actions.
attributes.background:
Given the recent assault on police, the ones who keep us safe, it is absolutely vital they get more protection. It is for their own lives, their families, friends and partners. They deserve more support! 
In addition this will help a possible offender to re-think their future actions.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332844
